name: Bootstrap-jalali-datepicker
body:
### Welcome to Bootstrap Jalali Datepicker
This is a fork of [ikelin](https://github.com/ikelin/bootstrap-datepicker)'s original code.
The jQuery UI Datepicker widget customized for Jalali Calendar (Shamsi, شمسی) using in Iran.

### How to Use
To create a simple date picker:
`$("#datepicker").datepicker();`

To set RTL mode:
`$("#datepicker").datepicker({
     isRTL: true
});
`

More options avaiable in Demo folder.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
